column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: period. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.org/> .ex:period rdf:type owl:Class .ex:hasPeriod rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;  rdfs:domain ex:Entity ;  rdfs:range ex:period .ex:startDate rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;  rdfs:domain ex:period ;  rdfs:range xsd:dateTime .ex:endDate rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;  rdfs:domain ex:period ;  rdfs:range xsd:dateTime .ex:Entity rdf:type owl:Class .<http://example.org/#period1> rdf:type ex:period ; ex:startDate "2023-01-01T00:00:00"^^xsd:dateTime ; ex:endDate "2024-12-31T23:59:59"^^xsd:dateTime . <http://example.org/#entity1> rdf:type ex:Entity ; ex:hasPeriod <http://example.org/#period1> .
